description:
An adopted child of the http://anidb.net/ch126122 [CEO] of http://anidb.net/ch132072 [Grassley Defense Systems], one of the http://anidb.net/ch132088 [group]â€™s three branches. A third-year student in the piloting department who leads http://anidb.net/ch125790 [Grassley House]. Shaddiq is a smooth-talking ladies` man with a carefree manner. Although still a student Shaddiq has shown his skill in business too, he is a candidate for next generation executive.
Source: Official page
name: Shaddiq Zenelli
